name: Premier Inn Hull City Centre

reviews.text: Stayed on business. Free parking and about 10 mins walk from city centre. It is in a run down industrial area but beside the Deep Center.
reviews.title: Bright, modern and great staff

reviews.text: The hotel itself is one of the modern first class Premier |Inns. Great views over estuary. Everything clean bright and modern.
reviews.title: top premier

reviews.text: Food in restaurant was the standard Premier Inn mix but well done and staff were unfailingly helpful and cheerful. They really went out of their way to help and make you feel welcome. It was a delight to stay there and the price was incredibly low.
reviews.title: Great Location for exploring Hull, great value for money.

reviews.text: hi there been there 4 time this year and going back in the new year
reviews.title: Saved our weekend away!!!

reviews.text: Stopped at this hotel for one night in a twin room with my sister. Visiting Hull to watch the ice hockey & visit The Deep.
reviews.title: Excellent but mind the steaks!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I have to say what a lovely stay again,all the staff are a credit to the company,i work in a hotel,so have high standards when it comes to housekeeping, and the hotel is so so clean.Great value for money and will be using PREMIER INN every time i go away,if there is one in the area,first class,ah and the breakfast was excellent ,very tasty sausages indeed .
reviews.title: 2 nd stay and as good as the last

reviews.text: It needs to be said that your receptionst ' paddy ' was excellent and very kind during the phone call i had with him. Although i haven't yet stayed at the Hotel, he should be treasured as i have booked alot of premier inn hotels over the phone and he has to have been on the best and most friendly. I now look forward to my stay even more knowing that paddy has gave me a postivite view of your hotel and the staff that work there.
reviews.title: Excellent Receptionist

reviews.text: Thank You.
reviews.title: Overall really nice hotel!

reviews.text: Excellent value for money at £29 for family room. Will definitely return! Nice room, very comfortable bed. My hair stuck to the headboard, seemed like old hair gel on the board. Would have been a very good room if it wasn't for that and an empty body wash disposer in the bathroom,
reviews.title: Great Location

reviews.text: Excellent breakfast. Really friendly staff. Free parking. Brilliant location for The Deep! Good view from room. Overall a really good place to stay.
reviews.title: Fantastic Value

reviews.text: Everything is pretty standard Premier Inn- exactly the same as everywhere else. However, some comments to differentiate this one:
reviews.title: Usual Premier Inn - some niggles

reviews.text: Location is still in an area very much under development. It is not attractive (even for Hull). If you have to walk to go out then do not do so alone - get a taxi! I guess this place will be better by 2013 or so. Road to town is lit but is very industrial and caused me to walk down middle of street.
reviews.title: excellent hotel, excellent value for money

reviews.text: Lift is still not working.
reviews.title: 1 day stay on 18/11/11

reviews.text: Heating is either hot or cold - took me a while to get a happy medium.
reviews.title: OK But......

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Get room looking to Humber and not the city - at least you can see something.
reviews.title: ENJOYABLE STAY AT HOTEL

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Everything so new & clean. The best staff for the best hotel. The bed was so comfy. Good view overlooking the deep.
reviews.title: Hughsie, Very good hotel

reviews.text: New and very clean and functional hotel. Perfect for business stays. The hotel has a nice restaurant/bar, which is good as you are a way from any restaurants. The hotel has aircon which was an added bonus.
reviews.title: Comfortable, Great Service - Perfect for Business Stays

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Just back from this hotel and thought it deserved a bit of detail.
reviews.title: Maybe the best hotel in Hull.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Imagine in your mind a funky looking multi storey car park that is six floors high.......are you with me so far?
reviews.title: top class

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Now, on top of that car park build a modern looking hotel and colour it purple and blue with some rakish angles thrown in. You're now pretty close to what the city centre Premier Inn looks like.
reviews.title: Fantastic stay

aka: Premier Inn Hull City Centre Hotel Kingston-Upon-Hull
description: Hull City Centre Premier Inn is a new build, open since 1st July 2009. Has fantastic views of the Humber Estury, Humber Bridge and surrounding City. Only a 2 minute walk from The Deep - Hulls biggest attraction and one of the UKs largest submarians. Conveniently located a short walk from Hull Marina, local theares and Museums with easy reach to the main shopping centres.
